summary: This code generates a sample C program, compiles it, and then deletes the temporary file.

details.comment: This code generates a sample C program, compiles it, and then deletes the temporary file.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
# whatever you think. this computer must be rearranged.
# all bullshit.
echo -e '#include <stdio.h>\nint main(){printf("this is the main lazero program.\\\n");}'>/dev/shm/sample.c && command c /dev/shm/sample.c && rm /dev/shm/sample.c
